page.description: Gets the value of all of the controls in the UX Component in the form of a query string (name/value pairs).

return.name: data
return.description: Returns the value of every control in the component as a query string.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.getData()]* method generates a URI encoded query string of "name=value" pairs for every control and variable defined in the UX Component. Multiple variable name-value pairs are joined using the ampersand (&). For example:

see.ref: How to Extract the Value from a URI Query String
